Description:
Model: 82XV0012US 

GPU
Intel i5-12450H 8C (4P + 4E) / 12T, P-core 2.0 / 4.4GHz, E-core 1.5 / 3.3GHz, 12MB

Graphics
NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 3050 6GB GDDR6 Boost Clock 1732MHz, TGP 95W

Memory
1x 8GB SO-DIMM DDR5-4800 (+1 slot disponible)

Storage
512GB SSD M.2 2242 PCIe 4.0x4 NVMe (+1 slot disponible)

Display
15.6" FHD, IPS-Level 144Hz 45% NTSC

Battery
60Whr

Super Rapid Charge (10-minute charge 0-30% capacity, 30-minute charge for 0-70% capacity, 80-minute charge for 0-100% capacity)

Audio
2x2W speaker system with Nahimic Audio

Camera
1080p FHD webcam with privacy shutter

Ports
1x USB 3.2 Gen 1
2x USB 3.2 Gen 2
1x USB-C® 3.2 Gen 2 (support data transfer, Lenovo® Power Delivery 140W and DisplayPort™ 1.4)
1x HDMI® 2.1, up to 8K/60Hz
1x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm)
1x Ethernet (RJ-45)
1x Power connector
Label: Lenovo LOQ RTX 3050 6G,15.6"FHD, i5-12450H, 8GB, 512GB SSD
